<style>
.shopify-section.section:has(form-embed#app-embed) {
    background: #F2F2F2;
}

</style>

<script>
  // Create a function to inject styles once the element is found
  function applyShadowStyles() {
    let shadowHost = document.querySelector('#app-embed');
    
    // Ensure the element exists and has a shadow root
    if (shadowHost && shadowHost.shadowRoot) {
      let shadowRoot = shadowHost.shadowRoot;

      let style = document.createElement('style');
      style.textContent = `
        section[data-sizing="form-wrapper"] {
          max-width: 1040px !important;
    padding: 30px 100px 80px;
        }
form._formFieldset_1ll8d_67 {
    flex-direction: row !important;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
justify-content: center !important;
}

form._formFieldset_1ll8d_67>div:nth-child(-n+6) {
    width: calc(50% - 5px);
    box-sizing: border-box; 
}
form._formFieldset_1ll8d_67>fieldset {
    width: 100%;
}
form._formFieldset_1ll8d_67>._selectContainer_1yit2_6 {
    /*width: calc(50% - 5px);*/
width: 100%; 
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
fieldset[name="custom#which_brands_are_you_interested_in_"] ._verticalLayout_171zd_6 {
    flex-direction: row;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

._checkboxField_171zd_1 {
   width: calc(25% - 7.5px);
    border: 1px solid #00000033;
    padding: 13px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-family: ITC Avant Garde Gothic Pro;
    font-size: 16px !important;
    font-weight: 500;
    line-height: 19.2px;
    text-align: left;
    border-radius: 6px;
cursor: pointer;
}
div#app-embed input {
    background: none !important;
}

button[aria-controls="country-selector-dropdown"] {
    background: none !important;
}

form._formFieldset_1ll8d_67>._selectContainer_1yit2_6 button {
    background: none !important;
}

button[type="submit"] {
    background: #E96C24 !important;
    border-radius: 20px !important;
    width: 360px !important;
    max-width: 80% !important;
line-height: 28px !important;
}
._checkboxField_171zd_1:has(input:checked) {
    background: #E96C24;
        border-color: #E96C24;
    color: #fff !important;
}
._checkboxField_171zd_1:has(input:checked) span {
    color: #fff !important;
}

._checkboxField_171zd_1:has(input:checked) input {
    accent-color: #ffffff;
}
._formDisclaimer_1ll8d_37 {
    width: 360px;
    max-width: 80%;
}
div#app-embed * {
    font-family: 'ITC Avant Garde Pro Md', sans-serif !important;
}
section._formHeader_1ll8d_19 {
    /*display: none !important;*/
}

div#app-embed legend {
    font-size: 20px !important;
padding: 20px 0; 
}
form._formFieldset_1ll8d_67>._selectContainer_1yit2_6 p {
    font-size: 20px !important;
    margin: 20px 0 !important;
    display: block;
    padding: 0;
}
div#app-embed button._formSubmitButton_1ll8d_81 {
    font-size: 20px !important;
    font-weight: 500;
}
._selectToggle_1yit2_25 {
background: none !important;
}
._textBody_2aowh_10 + ._nonMultineFieldLine_exnrn_11 {
    flex-grow: 1;
margin-top: 5px;
}
._nonMultineFieldLine_exnrn_11 + ._textBody_2aowh_10 {
    flex-grow: 1;
    text-align: right;
}
._nonMultineFieldLine_exnrn_11 {
    width: 100%;
}
@media (min-width: 769px) {
._nonMultineFieldLine_exnrn_11 {
    width: calc(33% - 4px) !important;
}
}
@media (max-width: 768px) {
form._formFieldset_1ll8d_67>div:nth-child(-n+6) {
    width: 100%;
}

._checkboxField_171zd_1 {
    width: calc(50% - 5px);
}

form._formFieldset_1ll8d_67>._selectContainer_1yit2_6 {
    width: 100%;
}
form._formFieldset_1ll8d_67>._selectContainer_1yit2_6 p {
    font-size: 16px !important;
    margin: 10px 0 !important;
}
div#app-embed legend {
    font-size: 16px !important;
    padding: 10px 0;
}
._nonMultineFieldLine_exnrn_11 + ._textBody_2aowh_10 {
    text-align: left;
}
}  
      `;

      // Append the style inside the shadow DOM
      shadowRoot.appendChild(style);
    }
  }

  // Set up the MutationObserver to look for the #app-embed element
  const observer = new MutationObserver((mutations) => {
    mutations.forEach((mutation) => {
      if (document.querySelector('#app-embed')) {
        // If #app-embed is found, apply styles and stop observing
        applyShadowStyles();
        observer.disconnect();
      }
    });
  });

  // Start observing the document for changes in the child list (DOM modifications)
  observer.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true });

</script>

<!--Jump on form-->
<script>
  $(document).ready(function() {
    // Function to determine the scroll offset based on device type
    function getScrollOffset() {
      const isMobile = $(window).width() <= 768; // 768px as mobile width breakpoint
      return isMobile ? 73 : 65; // 73px for mobile, 65px for desktop
    }

    // Smooth scroll function
    function scrollToSection(sectionId) {
      const offset = getScrollOffset(); // Get the appropriate offset
      const $section = $(sectionId); // Select the section by ID

      if ($section.length) {
        // Get the position of the section and scroll with offset
        $('html, body').animate({
          scrollTop: $section.offset().top - offset
        }, 800); // Duration of 800ms for smooth scrolling
      }
    }

    // Listen for clicks on all links that have href="#form"
    $('a[href="#form"]').on('click', function(event) {
      event.preventDefault(); // Prevent default anchor link behavior

      // Scroll to the target section
      scrollToSection('#shopify-section-template--23541377302891__rich_text_Qbnt99');
    });
  });
</script>
